name: test_e2e_with_logs[099_SQLI_TIME_016]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_TIME_016` |
| **Name** | MySQL BENCHMARK with large iterations |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | time_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `BENCHMARK(10000000,MD5('a'))`
- **Encoded**: `BENCHMARK(10000000%2CMD5('a'))`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~66000ms
- **Timestamp**: 02:28:38.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_TIME_016-1769912918544-cm1a7 pattern_id=SQLI_TIME_016 uri=/?q=BENCHMARK(10000000%2CMD5('a')) client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_TIME_016-1769912918544-cm1a7 pattern_id=SQLI_TIME_016 uri=/?q=BENCHMARK(10000000%2CMD5('a')) client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
02:28:38.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_TIME_016-1769912918544-cm1a7 pattern_id=SQLI_TIME_016 uri=/?q=BENCHMARK(10000000%2CMD5('a')) client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
